korean: 뭘 좋아할지 고민하다가 화장품 세트를 샀어.
케이크랑 풍선도 준비하고 맛있는 음식도 시켰어.
친구가 들어오자마자 불 끄고 깜짝 파티를 시작했어.
친구가 정말 좋아해서 나도 기분이 좋았다.
다 같이 케이크 먹고 노래도 부르고 재밌게 놀았어.
선물도 진짜 마음에 들어 한다고 해서 다행이야.
이런 날이 있어서 우정이 더 돈독해지는 것 같아.
english: It was my friend's birthday, so I went to buy a gift.
After thinking about what they'd like, I bought a cosmetics set.
I picked the brand my friend usually uses.
I asked them to wrap it nicely too.
We met in the evening and, like, threw a surprise party.
I had planned it with other friends in advance.
We prepared a cake and balloons and ordered delicious food.
As soon as my friend came in, we turned off the lights and started the surprise party.
My friend really loved it, and I felt happy too.
They were so moved they almost cried.
We all ate cake, sang songs, and had fun together.
I'm glad they said they really liked the gift.
Seeing my friend happy made it worthwhile.
I think having days like this makes our friendship even stronger.
